item.description:
This event open to sea kayaks and rec kayaks 10ft and above Come join us for a leisurely paddle up the lazy York River from York Harbor up to Scotland Bridge approx. 9miles round trip. High Tide is approx. 1:40 so we'll ride the Flood in and return on the Ebb. Parking along the road at the Town dock is limited but you can park across the Bridge at the wiggly bridge lot. We'll stop for a snack along the route and maybe swim at Scotland Bridge if it's nice. Pack a snack/lunch as well as water. After the paddle we'll stop somewhere for a PPPO "Post Paddle Pig Out" so bring some doe. See the link below for directions from Portsmouth avoiding the Maine Turnpike Tolls

Below is a Google Maps directions link to York Harbor Town Dock #2 

http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&source=s_d&saddr=Rt+95+NH+Ave,+Portsmouth,+Rockingham,+New+Hampshire+03801&daddr=I-95+N+to:US-1+to:43.111134,-70.735302+to:10+Harris+Island+Rd,+York,+ME+03909,+us&geocode=%3BFWxKkQIdVP3H-w%3BFdjKkQIdCqDI-w%3B%3B&hl=en&mra=dme&mrcr=0&mrsp=3&sz=14&via=1,2,3&sll=43.095342,-70.751438&sspn=0.04312,0.059052&ie=UTF8&ll=43.12567,-70.703459&spn=0.043099,0.059052&t=h&z=14
item.how_to_find_us: Look for kayakers - parking is limited
item.name: York River Paddle
